meanings.definition: In a way that relates to an individual person
meanings.sent1: I like to handle things personally.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to speak to customers personally.
meanings.sent3: He took the lost puppy personally and made sure it found its way home.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's feedback hit me personally, making me strive to improve.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with the issue personally made it more meaningful and impactful.

meanings.definition: In a way that is done by a particular person
meanings.sent1: I will personally deliver the package to your doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The chef personally prepares each dish for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The robot claimed it could personally cook a gourmet meal, which amused everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her signature style was personally woven into every design she created.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the artist personally paint the mural added a special touch to the experience.

meanings.definition: In a way that is based on personal feelings or opinions
meanings.sent1: I personally believe in helping others whenever possible.
meanings.sent2: She personally thinks that honesty is the best policy.
meanings.sent3: His decision to wear a superhero costume to work was personally amusing.
meanings.sent4: The song's lyrics personally resonated with me, touching my heart deeply.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing the sunset personally painted a beautiful picture in her mind.
